body:
The test you are changing says explicitly that it *shouldn't* be namespaced. :) This is because you are changing the `namespaced_genrators_test` which are specifically for when you have an isolated engine.

In other words, we need to account for two scenarios:

1) The scenario you posted in the bug description;

2) The scenario you have a namespaced engine and you *don't* want the full namespace, because the router is already namespaced as a whole.

Therefore I would suggest to add a new test to the scaffold/resource generator test case and ensure the current one keeps passing, specially because of this line:

https://github.com/parndt/rails/blob/2fa841aa17d924610d963ad404d4af2b59e6de0a/railties/test/generators/namespaced_generators_test.rb#L10 

And always send pull requests to the master branch. We can always backport it later.

Thanks!
